subject: p11052935
Findings: AP portable upright chest radiograph was provided. The lungs are hyperinflated with upper lobe lucency compatible with emphysema. No focal consolidation, effusion, or pneumothorax seen. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is normal. Bony structures are intact.
